name: koishi-plugin-elysia-api-orchestrator
description: Inspired by New-API, the Elysia-API model orchestrator plugin manages API gateways and allows users to define custom model groups. This plugin depends on the model aggregator plugin.
author: MissPinkElf <xiaolan20020118@gmail.com>

description.zh: 借鉴自 New-API 的 Elysia-API 模型编排插件，用于管理 API 网关；允许用户自定义模型组。本插件依赖于模型聚合插件工作。
description.en: Inspired by New-API, the Elysia-API model orchestrator plugin manages API gateways and allows users to define custom model groups. This plugin depends on the model aggregator plugin.
